Understate: The claim may understate the potential impact of the proposed education changes on teacher pay.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the assertion that no teacher's pay will be cut.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the proposed education changes will not have any negative impact on teacher pay, which may be a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or interpretations of the proposed education changes that could suggest potential cuts to teacher pay.
